name: js-given-root
description: JS GIVEN ROOT DO NOT PUBLISH

scripts.lint: echo "Don't worry, ESLint takes some time ..." && eslint . ./
scripts.lintFix: echo "Don't worry, ESLint takes some time ..." && eslint --fix . ./
scripts.cleanNodeModules: for dir in `find . -name 'package.json' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 dirname | sort --unique | grep -v node_modules`; do (cd $dir; pwd; rm -vfr node_modules); done
scripts.install: for dir in `find . -name 'package.json' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 dirname | sort --unique | grep -v node_modules | grep -v '^.$' | grep -v 'js-given/dist' `; do (cd $dir; pwd; yarn --ignore-engines); done
scripts.upgradeExamplesToLatest: for dir in `find examples -name 'package.json' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 dirname | sort --unique | grep -v node_modules`; do (cd $dir; pwd; yarn upgrade js-given@latest); done
scripts.upgradeExamplesToNext: for dir in `find examples -name 'package.json' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 dirname | sort --unique | grep -v node_modules`; do (cd $dir; pwd; yarn upgrade js-given@next); done
scripts.__doYarnInstallOnJsGivenOnExamples: for dir in `find examples -name 'package.json' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 dirname | sort --unique | grep -v node_modules`; do (cd $dir; pwd; yarn install); done
scripts.testExamplesOnMaster: (cd js-given; yarn build) && yarn __doInstallMasterJsGivenOnExamples && yarn __doTestExamples && yarn __doYarnInstallOnJsGivenOnExamples
scripts.__doInstallMasterJsGivenOnExamples: for dir in `find examples -name 'package.json' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 dirname | sort --unique | grep -v node_modules`; do (cp -v js-given/dist/* $dir/node_modules/js-given; rm -vf $dir/node_modules/.yarn-integrity); done
scripts.__doTestExamples: for dir in `find examples -name 'package.json' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 dirname | sort --unique | grep -v node_modules`; do (cd $dir; pwd; yarn test); done
scripts.test: yarn testJsGiven && yarn testExamples && yarn buildDocumentation && yarn coverage
